option.TableDetails: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TableDetails] @table varchar(100) as declare @sql varchar(max) set @sql='SELECT FieldName=a.name,FieldPK=case when exists(SELECT 1 FROM sysobjects where xtype=''PK'' and parent_obj=a.id and name in (SELECT name FROM sysindexes WHERE indid in (SELECT indid FROM sysindexkeys WHERE id = a.id AND colid=a.colid))) then ''是'' else ''否'' end,FieldDataType=b.name,FieldLength=COLUMNPROPERTY(a.id,a.name,''PRECISION''),FieldDecDigits=isnull(COLUMNPROPERTY(a.id,a.name,''Scale''),0),FieldNull=case when a.isnullable=1 then ''空'' else ''不空'' end,FieldValueDefault=isnull(REPLACE(REPLACE(e.text,''('''''',''''),'''''')'',''''),''''),FieldDesc=isnull(g.[value],'''') FROM syscolumns a left join systypes b on a.xusertype=b.xusertype inner join sysobjects d on a.id=d.id and d.xtype=''U'' and d.name!= ''dtproperties'' left join syscomments e on a.cdefault=e.id left join sys.extended_properties g on a.id=g.major_id and a.colid=g.minor_id left join sys.extended_properties f on d.id=f.major_id and f.minor_id=0 where d.name='''+@table+''' order by a.id,a.colorder' exec( @sql)
